item.title: Scanning for recursive DNS servers
item.description:
When working for an ISP it becomes pretty clear that you don’t want your customers or your network to participate in any attack. I wrote a small perl script to find DNS servers open for recursive requests

scandns.pl

I found 19 misconfigured DNS servers. Now the real work starts by contacting the owners.
